author: Nataliya Gumenyuk
title: The saddest irony of Putin’s war on Ukraine
description: Ukrainians and Russians understand each other well. Yet the war is showing how different the two countries are.
content: We have watched Russian President Vladimir Putin give an angry, hateful speech denying our existence as a country. We have also watched Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky address Russians in thei… [+4671 chars]
